name: JustPong
description:
JustPong is a simple ball game. That game has power ups and diffents game modes. I have implemented a classic mode and Ice mode. more modes coming soon. You can make suggestions for power ups and modes, etc.

Basically, I made this game for my little brother.

I come from the German area. Sorry for my terrible english. but the game doesn't have a lot of text and you should understand most of it, because a lot of it is in english

Instructions Purpose

Your mission is to fire the ball in your opposing goal. The game ends when the maxgoals are reached --> you can set that in the settings.

PowerUps

Timer shows when an power ups spawned. The power ups spawn at certain points. The power ups have different skills.

  • Superboost: If you collect this item, you will get a Super Boost effect.
  • maximize: If you collect this item, you become maximum size effect.
  • minimize: If you collect this item, you become minimum size effect.
  • freeze: If you collect this item, your opponent will get a freeze effect
In addition to power ups, as a player you have an ability to boost. You can use this ability with the "space" button (default). Modes

The rules and propertys of each game mode. The power ups work differently for each mode.

  • Classic mode: The classic mode is actually a normal mode with no restrictions. All powerups spawn  in the mode.
  • Ice mode: This mode has a snow filter effect. In this mode you will slide. The mode spawns only freeze power ups.
  • Randomize: This mode will not Power Ups spawn, but the Player get the Power Ups-effect
  • Custom: Customize your own mode
  • More coming soon.
Multiplayer

You can host a game and join a game. It is important that the host opens the port so that the other players can connect to the server.
